meanings.definition: A punishment or torture in which the soles of the feet are beaten with a stick or cudgel.
meanings.sent1: The prisoner received a bastinado for attempting to escape.
meanings.sent2: The cruel ruler ordered the bastinado as a form of punishment.
meanings.sent3: The guard chuckled as he prepared the bastinado for the disobedient prisoner.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the bastinado echoed through the dungeon, sending shivers down the spines of other prisoners.
meanings.sent5: The brutal bastinado left the victim writhing in pain on the cold floor.
